item.title: Announcing PriorityWiki: A Cause Prioritization Wiki
item.description: This essay was jointly written by Peter Hurford and Marcus A. Davis. Locating and keeping up to date on all of the information in all every cause worthy of attention is time-consuming work, and a task we think is likely to be duplicated many times over by individuals and organizations. Itâ€™s very useful when deciding what interventions to spend your time or money on to know what work has already been done in the area.
